description:
My place is a quiet studio on a historic tree lined Clinton Hill street, 1 block from the C train, 2 blocks from the G train, and a 12 minute walk to Atlantic terminal. Close to Fort Greene Park, and many cute local restaurants like Sisters, Emily Pizza, and Tilda All Day. 

You’ll love my place because of the location, the neighborhood, and the people. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Cozy studio with everything you need and nothing you don't. Super comfy Four Seasons mattress, quiet light filled apartment with elevator access and friendly neighbors.

Guests have access to the entire studio.

Available to help with whatever you might need.

Historic Clinton Hill is a beautiful tree lined neighborhood close to great restaurants, trains and urban exploration.

1 block from the C train, 2 blocks from the G train, and a 12 minute walk to Atlantic terminal.
name: Cozy studio in historic Clinton Hill near trains
